title: EmBody The Horror
description:
There are many things around us that have the ability to frighten us. A spooky house, an angry entity, or deadly creature. But we never suspect that the most terrifying thing might come from deep within. The most demonic dangerous creatures can be hiding within the human body, within our own minds.

First, keeping secrets can be killer 
Followed by stuck in purgatory
Then, the evil, everlasting hunger 
Finally in our featured story, the demon comes at night


Go to https://bombas.com/scary and get 20% off any purchase
